text:
@jeremycorbyn Imagine, post Covid19, a world where carers are more highly regarded than the careless rich, where ordinary people doing ordinary work are seen as more important than high-powered bureaucrats & business elites. Where kindness is prioritised over profit& greed.

We want that world
